item.title: Getting into Melee in 2023
item.description: Melee in 2023 I’d known melee existed as a competitive game for years but until slippi there wasn’t really a way for people to play casually. There had been netplay attempts with melee before but waiting around in lobbys or dolphin’s community servers wasn’t a great experience. I play fox Sometime last month I started playing online while I couldn’t play desktop competitive games. I was playing a lot of lichess and offline gamecube games.
